item.title: Hey ðŸ‘‹ I'm Kalhara
item.description: I’m a senior infrastructure engineering professional with 7+ years of experience in the field, from Colombo, Sri Lanka. Currently leading the infrastructure and IT team at Cummins Inc, Srilanka. Previously N*able, Eureka Technology Partners. Here are a few places you can find my writings on infrastructure, networking, security, automation and all the good stuff: https://twitter.com/kalharaxyz https://dev.to/kalharaxyz https://medium.com/@kalharaxyz And here’s my resume, if you’re interested.
